org.lwjgl.stb

Class STBTTAlignedQuad

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTAlignedQuad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class STBTTAlignedQuad
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Quad used for drawing a baked character, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_GetBakedQuad(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int).
